channel.title: [PI]One question about weapon stances
channel.description:
Well I have Chaotic Rapier, Korasi & Vesta long on my server. But I don't like the weapon stance... however the gravite rapier has the stance I want to have with chaotic rapier, korasi & vls. Where do I change that?
Is it client sided? and in which file?
Thanks! ;)
